SA15bsa059_u:2_0: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:2_3: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam /
SA15bsa059_u:3_0: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet? na;
SA15bsa059_u:3_1: tulyatvāt paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate /
SA15bsa059_u:4_0: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:4_4: anyathā darśanādanyanimittaṃ sidhyatīti cet? aparasminnapi samānameva,
SA15bsa059_u:4_6: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete /
SA15bsa059_u:5_0: animitte eva bahirmukhapratibhāsinīti kinneṣyate cet? animittatve sarvasyānimittatvaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa059_u:5_3: viśeṣābhāvāt / tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:6_0: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate /
SA15bsa059_u:6_2: na ko 'pi tatpūrvakaḥ syāt, viśeṣābhāvāt / ataḥ kriyāviśeṣasāmānyaṃ spandanaviśeṣasāmānyasya gamakam /
SA15bsa059_u:6_3: tatra yathā kriyāmupalabhya, ātmani spandanānupalambhādanyatra spandanapratītiḥ;
SA15bsa059_u:6_5: samānametat; paro 'pi parakriyābhilāpayornimittaṃ nāstīti kinnecchati? tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
SA15bsa059_u:7_2: paro 'pi svapnopalabdhaparakriyābhilāpau spandananimittakāviti kinna vadati? tayorabhāvāditi cet /
SA15bsa059_u:7_3: tathopalabdhisāpyāt kinna staḥ? atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya arthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:8_0: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet /
SA15bsa059_u:8_1: paraṃ prativigrahītuṃ yadi yuktyāgamarahitastathāvidho 'sad vādaḥ samāśriyeta,
SA15bsa059_u:8_2: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
SA15bsa059_u:8_3: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
SA15bsa059_u:8_5: kadācit svapne 'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva;
SA15bsa059_u:9_0: tāvattayā kriyayāpi taccittaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate? cittasya kāryatvāt /
SA15bsa059_u:9_1: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate? api ca,
SA15bsa059_u:9_5: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
SA15bsa059_u:10_2: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:10_4: anyasyānyathā / prāyeṇādhikṛtyāsau bhedaḥ / etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:10_5: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate:
SA15bsa059_u:10_6: na tvatyantāsadābhogāt / tasmāt sarvāvasthāsu kriyādivijñapteḥ cittaspandanamanumīyata eva /
SA15bsa059_u:11_0: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
SA15bsa059_u:11_2: bhavatvālambanodayaḥ, na tu kriyā / kriyayā spandanaṃ gamyate / bhrāntyavasthānāṃ kriyaiva na bhavati,
SA15bsa059_u:11_5: anyadānyathā ityeṣo 'dhikāraḥ kuto labdhaḥ? atha middhādināvasthānyathābhāvaścet /
SA15bsa059_u:11_7: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti /
SA15bsa059_u:12_0: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
SA15bsa059_u:12_3: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
SA15bsa059_u:13_0: kiṃ tarhi? tasya kāryatvāt / vijñaptiriti samutthāpakacittasantānājjāte kriyāvāgākārake jñāne eva /
SA15bsa059_u:14_0: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna? viṣayīkaraṇe 'rthāntaraṃ syāt /
SA15bsa059_u:14_1: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate? tatsvarūpājñāne tatsiddhairasambhavāditi cet 3? eṣa prasaṅgo 'pi samaḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:14_2: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
SA15bsa059_u:14_3: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham? [65-67]
SA15bsa059_u:15_0: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet? kiñca tatsāmānyaṃ paracittam evānyadvāhosvidavācyam /
SA15bsa059_u:15_2: na paracittam / tatkathamanena tad gamyate? nāpi sāmānyaṃ paracittameva /
SA15bsa059_u:15_3: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam /
SA15bsa059_u:16_0: na hyeṣā anumānaprakriyā / na hyanumānamarthasvarūpasya grāhakam /
SA15bsa059_u:17_1: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ /
SA15bsa059_u:18_3: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate /
SA15bsa059_u:18_7: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
SA15bsa059_u:18_9: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate /
SA15bsa059_u:19_1: sākṣāt paracittavidāṃ tu katham? yadi te paracittasya svarūpaṃ sākṣājjānanti,
SA15bsa059_u:19_3: atha na jānanti, kathaṃ te sākṣādvidaḥ? kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca bhavati /
SA15bsa059_u:19_4: atha na gṛhyate, kathaṃ tarhi pramāṇamiti cet? aprahīṇagrāhyagrāhaka vikalpayogināṃ paracittajñānamapi vyavahāre 'visaṃvādādeva pramāṇam,
SA15bsa059_u:19_5: rūpādidarśanavat; āśrayāparāvṛteḥ / yogabalāddhi teṣāṃ jñānaṃ paracittākāraviśeṣānukāri sphuṭābhamupajāyate,
SA15bsa059_u:19_8: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
